nodes.text: Sector 5-1-5 was a sector on the desert planet of Geonosis. During the First Battle of Geonosis, after Jedi Grand Master Yoda ordered all fire be focused on the nearest starship, a Clone Captain in the forward command center ordered all quadrants to the sector, allowing for the Republic's Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery Turbolasers to take down a core ship. After the ship fell to the battlefield below, the battle continued and was ultimately won by the Republic.
